sentences.sContent: The tragedy could have been averted if the crew had followed safety procedures.
sentences.sCn: 如果乘务人员按照安全规则操作，这场悲剧是可以避免的。

sentences.sContent: Henry averted his eyes as she undressed.
sentences.sCn: 她脱衣服的时候，亨利把目光转向别处。

trans.tranCn: 防止，避免；转移(目光、注意力等)
trans.tranOther: to prevent something unpleasant from happening
